dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare wander into these forsaken lands, interloper. What brings you to face the might of Karn, the Hell Knight Defender?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the power of darkness to command the shadows at my will.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a fellow seeker of darkness. Your ambition resonates with the chaos that swirls in these lands. But what can you offer in return?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My power is unmatched. Together, we can conquer all who oppose us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unmatched power, you claim? Karn respects strength above all. Join forces, and our foes shall tremble.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no need for alliances. Stand aside or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, stranger. Karn bows to none. Prepare to feel the wrath of the Hell Knight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am on a quest to restore balance and vanquish the forces of darkness that threaten this world.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance, you speak of? Karn sees only the inevitability of chaos and destruction. What makes you think you can defy such forces?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My resolve is unwavering. I will not falter in the face of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unwavering resolve, hm? Karn admires determination. Perhaps there is merit in your defiance after all.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your ignorance blinds you, Hell Knight. Prepare to face the consequences of your actions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignorance? You dare insult Karn's knowledge? Your fate is sealed, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge and understanding of the dark arts. Will you share your wisdom with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but power is earned, not given freely. What makes you think you are worthy of Karn's teachings?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I humbly seek to learn from one as formidable as you, to further my mastery of the shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Humble yet ambitious. Karn senses potential in your humility. Together, we may unravel the mysteries of darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance will be your downfall, Hell Knight. Prepare to face the consequences of underestimating me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance? Ha! Karn relishes in the challenge. Let us see if you can back up your words, intruder.
